task.title: Task: Complex Array Formulas
task.shortdesc: A task with a more complex array formula.

context.p: In the following example, from some student's gender and length (in cm) are listed. Use an array formula to calculate the average length of the male and female students.

fig.title: Average length of students per gender

image.alt: Average length of students per gender

step.cmd: Repeat the action for cell C12, the entered formula is =AVERAGE(IF(B2:B9="f",C2:C9)).
